name: CreateUserStatusUpdateNotificationRule
description:
Create a new status update notification rule for a user.

This tool creates a new notification rule for a user's status updates in a PagerDuty account. It should be called when you need to set up or modify a user's notification settings for incident interactions. Requires user write permissions.

parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.description: The ID of the user resource for which the notification rule is being created.

parameters.description: Specify the API version using the 'Accept' header for versioning.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type
parameters.description: The MIME type of the request body. Typically set to 'application/json'.

parameters.name: status_update_notification_rule
parameters.description: A JSON object representing the rule for contacting the user for incident status updates. It includes details like contact method and notification preferences.

status_update_notification_rule.description: A rule for contacting the user for Incident Status Updates.

value_schema.description: The status update notification rule to be created.
